text: Top 100 España is a record chart published weekly by PROMUSICAE (Productores de Música de España), a non-profit organization composed by Spain and multinational record companies. This association tracks record sales (physical and digital) in Spain. ==Albums== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !width=""|Chart date !width=""|Album !width=""|Artist !width=""
